verses.2: “Israel mite kiangah hih bangin gen in: Israel mite khat peuhpeuh hitaleh Israel sunga a peem khual mite hitaleh, a tate khat peuhpeuh Molek pasian tungah a pia mipa kithat dinga, mihonte in suang tawh deng lum ding uh hi.
verses.3: Kei mahmah in tua mipa ka maisiat dinga, ama mite lak panin ka hawl khia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a tate Molek tungah pia-in, ka biakbuk ninsakin, ka min siangtho daisak hi.
verses.4: Amah in Molek tungah a tate khat a piak ciangin mihonte in tua pa kimuhmawh bawlin amah a thah kei uh leh,
verses.5: keimah in tua mipa le ama innkuanpihte maisiatin, amah le Molek biakna ah amah a zuite khempeuh amauʼ mite lak panin ka hawl khia ding hi.
verses.6: “Mi khat vankahna le aisan lamah kihei-in tuate thu a dot leh, keimah in tua mipa ka maisiat dinga, ama mite lak panin amah ka hawl khia ding hi.
verses.7: Tua ahih ciangin note ki-ap unla siangtho un; bang hang hiam cih leh kei pen Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
verses.8: Ka thukhamte zui unla, tuate sem un; note a hong siangthosak Topa pen keimah ka hi hi.
verses.9: “Bang hang hiam cih leh a nu ahih kei leh a pa a samsia mi peuhmah kithat ding hi. Amah in a nu ahih kei leh a pa samsia khin a, ama sihna a mahmah ngawh ding ahi hi.
verses.10: “Pasal khatpeuh a veengpaʼ zi tawh a mawh leh, tua a khial pa le a khial nu kithat khawm ding hi.
verses.11: A paʼ zi tawh a lum khawm mipa in a pa a mindaisak a suak hi. Amau tegel kithat ding hi. Amauʼ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi.
verses.12: Pasal khat a monu tawh a lup khop leh, amau tegel kithat ding hi; amaute in sisan kinai lua mi tawh khialhna a bawl uh ahi hi. Amauʼ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi.
verses.13: Pasal khat in numei khat tawh lup khop bangin pasal dang khat tawh a lup khop leh, amau tegel kihhuaina a gamta khin uh ahih manin amaute kithat dinga, amauʼ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi.
verses.14: Pasal khat in zi nei-in, a ziʼ nu tawh zong a lak thuah leh, tua pen a kilawm lo ahi hi. Note lakah tua bang kilawm lohna a om loh nadingin tua pa le a nutate, mei tawh kihal lum ding hi.
verses.15: Pasal khatpeuh ganhing khat tawh a mawh leh amah le a ganhing kithat ding hi.
verses.16: Numei khat in ganhing khat naihin tua tawh a mawh leh, note in a numei le a ganhing na that ding uh hi; amauʼ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi.
verses.17: “Pasal khat in ama sanggamnu, ahih kei leh a nuʼ tanu teen pihin a lup khawm uh leh, tua pen a zumhuai hi a, amauʼ mipihteʼ omna panin amaute kihawl khia ding hi. Ama sanggamnu tawh mawh ahih manin tua pa in ama mawhna pua ding hi.
verses.18: Pasal khat, nin a nei numei khat tawh lum khawmin a mawh uh leh, amau tegel in siantho nading ngeina palsat uh ahih manin amauʼ mipihte lak panin kihawl khia ding hi.
verses.19: “Note pen na nuʼ sanggamnu ahih kei leh na paʼ sanggamnu tawh na mawh kei ding uh hi. Tua pen a nai behte tawh mawhna ahih manin amaute in amauʼ mawhna pua ding uh hi.
verses.20: Pasal khat, a paʼ sanggampaʼ zi tawh a lup khop leh, amah in a paʼ sanggampa a mindaisak ahi hi. Amaute in amauʼ khialhna thuak ding uh a, ta nei loin si ding uh hi.
verses.21: Pasal khat in a sanggampaʼ zi a lak leh, tua pen nitna hi a, amah in a sanggampa a mindaisak ahi hi. Amaute in ta nei lo ding uh hi.
verses.22: “Tua ahih ciangin note in ka thukham khempeuh le ka biakna ngeina kipte khempeuh zui-in, tuate na sem ding uh hi. Tua pen note na ten nadingun kong paipih nading leitang in note hong luakkhiat loh nading ahi hi.
verses.23: Noteʼ mai ah keimah in ka paihkhiat minamteʼ ngeinate na zui kei ding uh hi. Amaute in hih nate khempeuh hih uh ahih manin amaute ka kih hi.
verses.24: Ahih hangin keimah in note kiangah, ‘Note in amauʼ leitang na luah ding uh hi. Bawngnawi le khuaizu a luanna leitang, na neih dingun note tungah kong pia ding hi,’ kong ci khinzo hi. Kei pen miteʼ kiang panin note a hong khen khia Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi.
verses.25: Tua ahih ciangin note in ganhing a siang le a nin, vasa a siang le a nin khentelna na bawl ding uh hi. Note in nin hi, ci-in na seh dingun keimah in ka tuam koih sa ganhing hitaleh vasa hitaleh leitung a a pai thei khat peuhpeuh tawh hitaleh, note na kininsak kei ding uh hi.
verses.26: Note pen keima adingin na siangtho ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa ahi keimah ka siangtho a, note pen keima-aʼ na hih theih nadingun mite kiang panin note kong tuam koih zo hi.
verses.27: “Numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin van a kah a, ai a saan leh kithat dinga, suang tawh amaute kidenglum ding hi. Amauʼ sihna amau mah ngawh ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
